group_1.textLeft: What are you doing, Melissa?

group_1.textRight: Oh, it's the new player who followed me@the other day in my game.
I've taken them under my wing.
They gave me their ID, and we've been@exchanging messages since.

group_1.textLeft: Wow!

group_1.textRight: ...I believe I've found a way to send our@interloper home.

group_1.textLeft: Really?!

group_1.textRight: Yes.
According to this,
we must ring the "Sacred Bell," and the lost@will return to their world.
Oh, I've seen a story like that play out before!
It was in a game called "Magia Record,"
as part of a collaboration event called@"The Chiming Bell That Transcends Time."

group_1.textLeft: I don't know why...but I get the feeling@we shouldn't dig into that topic...

group_1.textRight: From what I remember...if you ring the church@bell, you return to your original world.
The event that's happening right now is@the sequel to that, called–
Let's stop right there - you'll ruin@everything otherwise.

group_1.textLeft: We may be a missionary school, but does that@mean we have a bell in the main hall?
There's one in the clock tower!@It's in the same place as the chimes!
I recall them both being@mechanically operated.

group_1.textRight: ...And the controls are in the@student council room.

group_1.textLeft: And the student council is...one floor below@the top of the clock tower, correct?

group_1.textRight: It's that room with the loud ringing...
When it comes to the student council room,@they're not going to let us in with open arms.

group_1.textLeft: The sooner we do this, the better!@Let's hurry while the enemy is off-guard!
Huh...? The door isn't opening.

group_1.textRight: Tart, look outside...! The student council maids!
There are a lot of people gathered around@the door, too.

group_1.textLeft: ...!@[chara:402250:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:402250:lipSynch_1]We're surrounded!

group_1.textRight: Looks like they're aware we're on the move...
Are you feeling unwell, Tart?

group_1.textLeft: No, it's just... I realized we haven't seen@our guest around in a while...

group_1.textRight: You mean that mysterious creature?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
Is it possible that the student council@caught them?

group_1.textRight: That can't be...
No, it's very much possible.
The student council has taken the initiative@and surrounded us,
which means...

group_1.textLeft: Do they know we're trying to free@the interloper?

group_1.textRight: We don't know for sure...but they're not@letting their guard down.
...And they're likely watching our every move.

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* Of course we are! There are@cameras in every corner of the school!

group_1.textRight: Mistress Corbeau, should we fortify@the clock tower?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, both the clock tower where the student council@room is, and the main hall where Minou is to@perform the ritual.
These two points are critical,@and must be protected.

group_1.textRight: Yes, ma'am!

group_1.textLeft: Still, if they can't leave the library, we won't@have to bother playing defense at all!

group_1.textRight: We have successfully communicated our@instructions to Vice Principal La Trémoille.

group_1.textLeft: What for?

group_1.textRight: We'll be having him saddle Monsieurs@La Hire and De Rais...
...with busywork to distract them@and ensure the ceremony...
...will be completed without@interference on their end.

group_1.textLeft: Seems like everything's working out great!

group_1.textRight: Indeed it is. By the way, Lapin,
have you recently started@exchanging messages...
...with your in-game friends?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:402700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Hey, how did you know that?!

group_1.textRight: ...That's what I thought.
Oh, it's the new player who followed me@the other day in my game.
I've taken them under my wing.
They gave me their ID, and we've been@exchanging messages since.
So by now,
the enemy must have sent a message@to Minou's phone...
What's this notification for...?

group_1.textLeft: Mokyu?
